solution_line_template: They need ${game_cost}/game x {number_of_players} games= ${total_money_needed} in total.

If one ice cream is sold for ${ice_cream_price}, they will need to sell ${total_money_needed} / ${ice_cream_price}/ice cream = <<{total_money_needed}/{ice_cream_price}={number_of_ice_creams}>>{number_of_ice_creams} ice creams.
